product_name: Columbia Schooner Bank Cachalot III Hat
long_description: Don't let the harsh sun stop you from having fun. The Columbia Schooner Bank(TM) Cachalot III hat provides UPF protection and has a cape to shade your neck. Nylon Omni-Shade(TM) fabric provides UPF 50 protection from the sun. Rear cape shades your neck. Polyester sweatband wicks moisture off your brow. Fit of the The Columbia Schooner Bank Cachalot III hat can be adjusted with a drawcord and toggle at the back.
short_description: Don't let the harsh sun stop you from having fun. The Columbia Schooner Bank(TM) Cachalot III hat provides UPF protection and has a cape to shade your neck.
